parameters.query: SELECT channel_id, channel_name, style_id, avatar_seed, COALESCE(style_config, '{}'::jsonb) as style_config FROM media_channels WHERE channel_id = $1 LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO media_assets (channel_id, product_id, asset_type, asset_url, metadata, created_at) VALUES ($1, $2, 'liveportrait_video', $3, $4::jsonb, NOW()) ON CONFLICT (channel_id, asset_type, asset_url) DO UPDATE SET metadata = EXCLUDED.metadata, updated_at = NOW() RETURNING id
INSERT INTO kj_knowledge_graph (data_type, source_workflow, channel_id, insights, metadata, created_at) VALUES ('liveportrait_analysis', 'N3-103', $1, $2::jsonb, $3::jsonb, NOW()) RETURNING id

options.queryParams: ={{ [$json.channel_id, JSON.stringify({ emotion_intensity: $json.style_config.emotion_intensity, personality: $json.style_config.personality, output_quality: 'high' }), JSON.stringify({ task_id: $json.task_id, channel_name: $json.channel_name })] }}
